doc:
Sonny Tufts https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sonny_Tufts 0 Bowen Charlton "Sonny" Tufts III (July 16, 1911 – June 4, 1970) was an American stage, film, and television actor and opera singer. He is best known for the films he made as a contract star at Paramount in the 1940s, including So Proudly We Hail!. He also starred in the cult classic Cat Women on the Moon. Bowen_Charlton_"_Sonny_"_Tufts_III ( July_16_,_1911 – June_4_,_1970 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actor_and_opera_singer . He is_best_known for the_films he made as a_contract_star at Paramount in the_1940s , including So Proudly We Hail ! . He also starred in the_cult_classic_Cat_Women on the_Moon .
